name: HTMLifier
description:
This what I Used to put my games on itch.io. How to use: Copy the link to the scratch game you want to download, pull up a new tab and paste the link, highlight the code (example: 325941082 (code for UCN Rejected on scratch)), Then copy it. pull up this page or the downloaded html file and paste it into the box next to "Project ID." then configure your setting for the file and click HTMLify and download it :)

Here's how to use:
